statements.statement: What is the chemical symbol of [QUESTION]?
Quel est le symbole chimique du [QUESTION]?
Was ist das chemische Symbol für [QUESTION]?

questions.question: elementLabel
questions.sparqlQuery: SELECT DISTINCT ?element ?[QUESTION] ?[ANSWER] WHERE { ?element wdt:P31 wd:Q11344 . ?element wdt:P246 ?[ANSWER] . ?element rdfs:label ?[QUESTION] . FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?element wdt:P31 wd:Q1299291 } . FILTER(LANG(?[QUESTION])='[LANGUAGE]') } LIMIT 50

statements.statement: What is the atomic number of [QUESTION]?
Quel est le numéro atomique du [QUESTION]?

questions.question: elementLabel
questions.sparqlQuery: SELECT DISTINCT ?element ?[QUESTION] ?[ANSWER] WHERE { ?element wdt:P31 wd:Q11344 . ?element wdt:P1086 ?[ANSWER] . ?element rdfs:label ?[QUESTION] . FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?element wdt:P31 wd:Q1299291 } . FILTER(LANG(?[QUESTION])='[LANGUAGE]') } LIMIT 50

questions.question: countryLabel
questions.sparqlQuery: SELECT DISTINCT ?country ?[QUESTION] ?[ANSWER] WHERE { ?country wdt:P31 wd:Q6256 . ?country wdt:P36 ?capital . ?capital rdfs:label ?[ANSWER] . ?country rdfs:label ?[QUESTION] . FILTER(LANG(?[QUESTION])='[LANGUAGE]') FILTER(LANG(?[ANSWER])='[LANGUAGE]') } LIMIT 50

questions.question: countryLabel
questions.sparqlQuery: SELECT DISTINCT ?country ?[QUESTION] ?[ANSWER] WHERE { ?country wdt:P31 wd:Q6256 . ?country wdt:P30 ?continent . ?country rdfs:label ?[QUESTION] . ?continent rdfs:label ?[ANSWER] . FILTER(LANG(?[QUESTION])='[LANGUAGE]') FILTER(LANG(?[ANSWER])='[LANGUAGE]') } LIMIT 50

questions.question: personLabel
questions.sparqlQuery: SELECT DISTINCT ?person ?[QUESTION] (YEAR(?birthdate) AS ?[ANSWER]) WHERE { ?person wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . ?person wdt:P569 ?birthdate . ?person rdfs:label ?[QUESTION] . FILTER(LANG(?[QUESTION])='[LANGUAGE]') } LIMIT 50

FILTER(LANG(?[QUESTION])='[LANGUAGE]') FILTER(LANG(?[ANSWER])='[LANGUAGE]') } LIMIT 50
